result.name: Facebook Glass Pane Theme/Skin
result.description:
The Facebook glass pane theme is a modern and transparent design that creates a seamless and visually appealing experience for users when browsing the Facebook website. The theme is achieved using a combination of CSS code that is injected into the Facebook page using a code injector extension such as Tampermonkey, GreaseMonkey, and Code Injector.

Code Injector(Extension)>
#: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/code-injector/edkcmfocepnifkbnbkmlcmegedeikdeb
#: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/codeinjector/
result.notes:
#: 07/25/23|>
Version 1.0>
First release for the Facebook Glass Pane. In this release, have made several changes to the glass pane to enhance overall user experience.

Changes Made:

   1.  Background Image
   2. Glass Effect
   3. Fonts
   4. Color of Text

#: 08/11/2023
1. Login Page
2. Viewing Story colors
3. Image Shine Effect
